page.title: 13A PLAYGROUND GAME
page.content: One of my favourite playground games is Billy Tig ,we play that nearly every playtime and up to eighty people can play. The rules are that a person counting gives you one hundred off and you have to run and hide.Then the person that's on has twenty seconds in his area to see if he can see anyone.Then after the 20 seconds are up he is allowed out to try and tig someone.The people who are hiding have to try to get their Billy at the Billypost and say Billypost and say Billy 1,2,3 and then your name and if the person who is on tigs someone they are on.
